extendedInfo.description: LoboWiki is an unofficial, comfortable Wikipedia reader & browser designed for Android 4.x (ICS / Ice Cream Sandwich) phones.The main idea behind LoboWiki is to allow users to read Wikipedia articles in a distraction-free manner. It means that all the links you click are added to the reading queue, instead of being immediately opened. Use the swipe gesture to move between articles in your reading queue!LoboWiki is designed to be to simple, clean and user friendly (it's Holo!). It's not going to be a full-blown research tool - I'll focus on making it pleasure to use during longer, casual reading sessions.The UI is currently available in English, Polish and Italian.It's not optimized for tabet-sized devices!Supported Wikipedia languages: English, Alemannisch, AzÉrbaycanca, ÐÑÐ»Ð³Ð°ÑÑÐºÐ¸, Äesky, Dansk, Deutsch, eesti, euskara, espaÃ±ol, franÃ§ais, hrvatski, Italiano, æ¥æ¬èª, LietuviÅ³, LatvieÅ¡u, magyar, Nederlands, âªnorsk (nynorsk), âªnorsk (bokmÃ¥l), polski, PortuguÃªs, romÃ¢nÄ, Ð ÑÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹, SlovenÄina, SlovenÅ¡Äina, Suomi, Svenska, TÃ¼rkÃ§e, Ð£ÐºÑÐ°ÑÐ½ÑÑÐºÐ°LoboWiki is not affiliated with Wikipedia Foundation & Wikimedia.LoboWiki does not collect any user data and personal information. It does not use any proxy servers - it retrieves all the data and articles directly from Wikipedia and Wikimedia servers.

reviews.title: Best wikipedia reader.
reviews.comment: Only improvement would be if it could act as the default Wikipedia client, so all links from other apps are directed there and added to my queue.  5* when it can do this!
reviews.author: David McElroy

reviews.title: Let us use it to open Wikipedia links!
reviews.comment: It would be perfect otherwise!
reviews.author: J. Michael Eugenio

reviews.title: Very good.
reviews.comment: Not many features at present but what\'s there is solid.
reviews.author: Matthew Cree

reviews.title: Best Wiki App
reviews.comment: Best App to learn with Wikipedia. Ad free. Thank you. Has also dark theme for long time reading.
reviews.author: Andre Schindler

reviews.title: Eternal
reviews.comment: Soothing interface and the font is awesome for reading.
reviews.author: anjali b

reviews.title: Very nice Wikipedia reader with a few minor bugs
reviews.comment: Action bar gets toggled sometimes by clicking links, show table sometimes shows empty tables. Dev did not reply to my bug report via email. 1 star off.
reviews.author: Frank Rehse

reviews.title: Easy to navigate.
reviews.comment: Love the way this works.  Perfect.
reviews.author: Paul Allaway

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Clean, easy interface, looks great! Only suggestion would be to maybe introduce an asterix next to external links so you know it\'s an outside website.
reviews.author: Dave Topping

reviews.title: Clean Wiki Reader.
reviews.comment: My only feedback is to enable full screen when reading an article. The shade top bar should scroll away when I\'m scrolling down.
reviews.author: Kirby Gauthier

reviews.title: Gorgeous but flawed
reviews.comment: Please please make this app able to open all Wikipedia links as default or open source it so someone else can ...great looking app that gets lost in the shuffle because of that simple missing feature. Thank you!
reviews.author: Kyle Jose

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice design and fast article loading.
reviews.author: Davor Lukenda

reviews.title: Great app missing a few additions
reviews.comment: Great looking app and the queue is a great idea ; could do with an ability to jump straight to an article rather than queue everything and swipe to remove from queue. Looks great though excellent work!
reviews.author: James Topliss

reviews.title: Almost there
reviews.comment: There is still missing feature here and therr, but overall it is far better than the official app. I strongly recommend to install this app to your handheld.
reviews.author: Fuad Hasan B

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: Finally a wiki browser that doesn\'t force you open the stupid random article of the day
reviews.author: Stephen Rifkin

reviews.title: Great App, Needs Intents
reviews.comment: The one thing keeping this from being the absolute best wikipedia reader is the lack of intents integration. I wish I could launch LoboWiki when clicking any wikipedia link! Instead they open in Chrome.
reviews.author: Alex Moody

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: The UI is perfect. But the app is very poor in features and options. No browsing in categories, no favourites, saving articles for offline reading. PICTURES CANNOT BE SAVED and ARTICLES CANNOT BE SHARED (links)! Due to lack of these basic features the app is useless. Ps. Even history cannot be cleared... The worst app ever.
reviews.author: Josef Handsuch

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Fantastic interface and clean font. If you could make the app pick up URLs it would be 5 stars :-)
reviews.author: Craig Sisson

reviews.title: Simple and quick
reviews.comment: Lovely reader. It would be great if it could open Wikipedia links from other apps.
reviews.author: Denver Lobo

reviews.comment: Cool wiki reader
reviews.author: Russel Nickson

reviews.title: Nicest Wikipedia reader
reviews.comment: Extremely slick, smooth, and simple, and I wouldn\'t have it any other way. Clicking on links to queue articles instead of just taking you there is a very fun way of browsing, and sliding left and right to move through your queue feels super awesome.
reviews.author: Ben Carlsson
